mapper.insert: SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id insert into task (id, privilege, default_time, task_name, step, discard, create_date, modify_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{privilege,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{defaultTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{step,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discard,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
